meanings.sent1: The krang of the metal gate slamming shut echoed through the empty alley.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers heard a loud krang as the metal beam fell to the ground.
meanings.sent3: The krang of the pots and pans falling in the kitchen startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The krang of the thunderstorm made the windows rattle in their frames.
meanings.sent5: The krang of the car crash was heard from blocks away.

meanings.definition: A type of fictional alien character in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles franchise.
meanings.sent1: In the cartoon, the evil krang always had a devious plan to take over the world.
meanings.sent2: The action figure of the krang alien was a popular toy among kids in the 90s.
meanings.sent3: During Halloween, Tim dressed up as the krang alien and won the costume contest.
meanings.sent4: The krang alien in the movie had tentacles and a robotic body, making it a fearsome foe.
meanings.sent5: The comic book depicted the krang alien as a formidable enemy of the Ninja Turtles.
